pct_pop_broadband:perc_w_broadband.short_description: Percent of population self-reported to have a broadband internet connection (any type of internet other than a dial-up)
pct_pop_broadband:perc_w_broadband.long_description: Percent of population self-reported to have a broadband internet connection. Broadband internet is defined as any type of internet other than a dial-up. Based on American Community Survey ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates.
pct_pop_broadband:perc_w_broadband.statement: {value} of the population in {features.name} has a broadband connection
